result.arabic_text: وَلَمَّا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥٓ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
result.translation: Yusufu rero amaze kugera mu bigero, Twaramuhaye gutomora ingingo, Tumwigisha n’ubumenyi. Ni nk’ukwo nyene rero Twebwe Allah Twahemvye Yusufu, Duhemba abagwaneza[4].
result.footnotes: [4] Iyi Aayah iraremesha Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah) hamwe n’abagwaneza bose.
